name: Mexico City Wild Wings Cross-Stitch Logo
name_original: Mexico City Wild Wings Cross-Stitch Logo
description:
This is a cross-stitch pattern of Blaseball's Mexico City Wild Wings (Wexico City Mild Wings). This design is about 7.5 inches in diameter. This is made with Stitch Fiddle, and as I am not a pro and this is just my hobby, it is free to download. If you like it or any other of my cross-stitch patterns, I would appreciate a tip. Thank you and as always, the commissioner is doing a great job! 

Original Logo by @thr33h3ad3ddrag.
